column5: What would it take make the Lodge somewhere everyone would like to visit? Anyone stayed there in the past?? Comments?

Free Beer...Seriously, when we go up north, we are looking to be a little more secluded. If the fishing wasnt so darn good in Minaki, we would look for something more remote.Myself, being on the road alot, the last thing I want to do is spend my vacation in a Hotel type resort. Then you have the problem with the boat traffic and current there. I would hesitate to keep my boat at the docks.Just one mans opinion.<{{}}><
Is the river frozen over yet or the surrounding lakes, just curious? How's the fishing around Minaki right now. I go to Minaki every June.
How that is a deal! How old is that picture? I did see them doing alot of work on it this summer but that would be on h_ll of a profit! Maybe duane could buy it he owns everything else in town!
The Lodge is NOT for sale - confirmed with Realtor as well as owner!!
